Package org.apache.jena.jdbc.results.metadata.columns

package org.apache.jena.jdbc.results.metadata.columns
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.jena.jdbc.results.metadata
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BooleanColumn
    Boolean column information
    ByteColumn
    Column information for byte columns
    ColumnInfo
    Abstract class for representing column information
    DateColumn
    Column information for date columns
    DateTimeColumn
    Column information for date time columns
    DecimalColumn
    Column information for decimal columns
    DoubleColumn
    Column information for double columns
    FloatColumn
    Column information for float columns
    IntegerColumn
    Column information for normal integer columns, integer columns report as Types.INTEGER for JDBC purposes because some of the XML Schema integer types equate to integer
    LongIntegerColumn
    Column information for integer columns, integer columns report as Types.BIGINT for JDBC purposes because most of the XML Schema integer types equate to longs
    NumericColumn
    Abstract column information for numeric columns
    ShortIntegerColumn
    Column information for short integer columns, note that no XSD types directly correspond to a Types.SMALLINT so this is not really used but merely provided for completeness.
    SparqlColumnInfo
    Abstract class for column information for columns originating from SPARQL results
    StringColumn
    Column information for string columns
    TimeColumn
    Column information for time columns
